title: Boyfriend
desc: The protagonist of our story, the rap king you've all known to come and love, Boyfriend! BF can simply be described as a stubborn family man. He has a ton of his own hobbies, but at the end of the day he would do anything for his Girlfriend. Follow BF's journey to gain GF's parent's approval and have a stable relationship!

cData.desc: Original D-Sides BF concept by DastardlyDeacon
Another D-Sides BF concept by DastardlyDeacon
The Making of the Old Sprite by FifLeo
